00037 // CNewVisionApp initialization
00038 
00039 BOOL CNewVisionApp::InitInstance()
00040 {
00041         // Check software expiration (set to 60 days)
00042         CExpire expire("NewVision Expiration Date", "{CA93B6E9-14BE-4d14-B4F4-5BDEB8806472}", 60, TYPEDAYS);
00043         if(expire.HasExpired())
00044                 return FALSE;
00045 
00046         CoInitialize(NULL);
00047         InitCommonControls();
00048 
00049         CWinApp::InitInstance();
00050 
00051         // Initialize OLE libraries
00052         if (!AfxOleInit())
00053         {
00054                 AfxMessageBox(IDP_OLE_INIT_FAILED);
00055                 return FALSE;
00056         }
00057         AfxEnableControlContainer();
00058         SetRegistryKey(_T("Alex Leykin Applications"));
00059         LoadStdProfileSettings(4);  // Load standard INI file options (including MRU)
00060         CSingleDocTemplate* pDocTemplate;
00061         pDocTemplate = new CSingleDocTemplate(
00062                 IDR_MAINFRAME,
00063                 RUNTIME_CLASS(CNewVisionDoc),
00064                 RUNTIME_CLASS(CMainFrame),       // main SDI frame window
00065                 RUNTIME_CLASS(CNewVisionView));
00066         if (!pDocTemplate)
00067                 return FALSE;
00068         
00069         AddDocTemplate(pDocTemplate);
00070         
00071         // Parse command line for standard shell commands, DDE, file open
00072         CCommandLineInfo cmdInfo;
00073         ParseCommandLine(cmdInfo);
00074         // create an empty new document first to initialize main frame
00075         cmdInfo.m_nShellCommand = CCommandLineInfo::FileNew; 
00076         if (!ProcessShellCommand(cmdInfo))
00077                 return FALSE;
00078 
00079         // then actually process command line arguments
00080         ParseCommandLine(cmdInfo);
00081         if (!ProcessShellCommand(cmdInfo))
00082                 return FALSE;
00083 
00084         // The one and only window has been initialized, so show and update it
00085         ResetMenus();
00086         m_pMainWnd->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00087         m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATENAVBAR);
00088         m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATESTATUSBAR);
00089         m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00090         
00091         // Read configuration file
00092         appSettingsForm = gcnew NewVision::AppSettings();
00093         return TRUE;
00094 }
00095 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 int CNewVisionApp::ExitInstance() {
00097         CoUninitialize();
00098         return 0;
00099 }
